comment: BEST PROFESSOR EVER! She made me actually enjoy speaking in front of people. She is super nice. Expectations for speeches are super easy anbd clear. Totally take her. Her final is super easy! Dont buy the text bbok though
She is very nice and sweet. Willing to help and make sure you pass. Makes each subject easy to understand by using movie clips. Have Fun!
Vey easy class, just take it and get it over with, shes a very easy grader, practise your speeches too, it helps
Easy class if you take use of the study guide before every test! Only downfall is she covers WAY too much material on one test so be cautious of that. Group project is easy. Highly recommended!

I see many haters on here. I'm a lazy student and I still am doing good. why? Because szalwinski has good intent and I've have worse teachers. She is good just because she ask to pay attention & not be rude doesn't make her a dictator it makes her a teacher but these turtle students are hating the wrong teacher.Way worse out there. Nice lady. peace
As long as you use the study guide, do the workbook, and do all the work in your group you will get an A.

WAY EASY! Easy A if you study the study guide. One oral project, but she's an easy grader. Watched movies clips and tv shows in class. Don't have to take notes, just attend to sign in for your group. Loved her and the class. She wasn't rude, she was nice.

I do not like her, personally, but she is a fine teacher. She can be rude and condescending. She encourages class discussion, but she doesn't really seem to care what people have to say. I wouldn't recommend her to any of my friends. The class is not hard though.

She treats you like a child. No phones allowed, and she is a total dictator about your computers. She is very moody, rude, and defensive... just as somebody said in an earlier post. You must buy the book and attend class. Not recommended.

I dreaded taking this class and put it off as long as possible.  I am pleased to say I would rank it as one of the most valuable classes I have taken in college. She makes it easy with wonderful study guides for the test.  Just prepare for your speeches, follow her outlines and show up for class. You can easily exempt the final!

kinda boring lectures, but easy class...as long as u stay within 3-4 mins on group presentation, print out & bring your study w/ a highlighter to class, and keep up w/ wk book assignments u can definitely get an A!
Really easy! Study guides are very easy and to the point. The group presentation was the only real work in the class, and she graded very fair.

Reading is key in this class. She was helpful and very clear. All tests were over material obvious in the book, and in her powerpoints. She also gave good study guides 4 tests. In clas of 25 she can offer more than in 50. Attendance was mandatory, with a catch. Miss < 1 day and exempt the final, regardless of grade in class! Try @ CTC w/ sm class.

Get in a good group! You will be with them for the rest of the semester. Workbook activities, group presentation(3-4 mins), and 4 tests. Just study the guide she gives before the test and you should make an A. Attendence is mandatory. I think you are allowed 3 misses

This class is just easy.   You really don't have to pay attention to the notes if you just read the chapters.  She gives you a study guide that's pretty much an outline.  If you just study the outline for tests, you could get a B, but there are some things she leaves out.   She's moody if you ask questions.  The class is just easy.

She keeps the class interesting. If you attend class, follow her powerpoints, scam the book, and study the guides she gives you it will be smooth sailing. Choose your group wisely..you will be with them all semester.
Nice lady. Notes are straight from powerpoint and tests are from notes and you must read the book. Had her friday class and she makes time go by a lot faster than you think.

Teaches straight from powerpoint that are available on WebCT. Soft-spoken and professional, yet has tendency to be moody and defensive. Atmosphere is like sitting in a business meeting instead of a classroom. Tests are from the book - reading is absolutely necessary to get an A.
